text: Vasilis Botinos (; 19 October 1944 – 16 February 2022) was a Greek footballer. He played for Olympiacos. Botinos made twelve appearances and scored three goals for the Greece national football team from 1967 to 1969. Botinos died on 16 February 2022 from COVID-19 in Athens, Greece at the age of 77.Πέθανε ο Βασίλης Μποτίνος ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Athens Category:Greek footballers
title: Vasilis Botinos
